data.text:
Bellâs Catering has been a family owned and operated catering service since it was established in 1979. Bellâs Catering has been successfully serving Perry, Florida and greater areas since inception. We have successfully catered events with a variety of themes with groups as large at 6000 people. We travel to you to help make your event a success. We have a broad service area and have serve guests as far south as the Florida Keys, as far North as South Carolina, and as far West as Beaumont, Texas.

Our Services are from the most basic âBackyard Gatheringâ to the most complex âStorm Restoration Base Campâ We at Bellâs Catering have several different divisions that handle all different types of events.

Full Catering Service- This service is just that âFull Cateringâ We will help you plan and provide whatever level of service you need to make your event successful. We will also provide you with cost effective options to make sure that the service level needs meets you budget. We have worked with Companies large and small to develop many budgetary feasible events that gets the job done and the message sent without ignoring the budgetary restrictions set by this new economy.

Delivery and Setup- This option is a more economical option for the customer that has additional help with the service aspect of a catered event. We will still provide all needed food and equipment items, it will just be delivered and setup for the customer to execute the end service to their guests.
